paragraphs: The Order of the New Moon must put an end to the Dragon Nahfahlaar. He is the enemy of our master, the almighty Lord Laatvulon, and he refuses to bow to the will of the New Moon. For these reasons and more, he must be exterminated.
Use all force necessary to take the sanctum where he hides. Let no one stop you! Do not return until the threat is eliminated.

May the New Moon soon rise above us all,
Ra'khajin
